Job Title: english teacher junior senior high school
Facility: Dynamic And Growing Learning Environment Strong Character Building Vigorous Teamwork
Job Description: Teach Indonesia School Is A Character Building And Biblical Based School Located In North Jakarta In Welcoming New Academic Year We Are Seeking A Highly Motivated And Qualified High School English And Homeroom Teacher To Join Our School Whom Is Passionate About Educating Young People And Has Experience In Teaching English To Students In Grades The Successful Candidate Will Be Responsible For Attending Class As Homeroom Teacher And Teaching English Language And Literature To Junior Senior High School Students Developing Effective Lesson Plans Building Students Skills Evaluating Student Progress Managing Students And Classroom And Maintaining Classroom Discipline Qualifications Age Preferably Years Oldeducation Minimum Bachelor S Degree In English Education Or A Related Field Is Required Experience The Candidate Should Have At Least Two Years Of Experience In Teaching Secondary School Students And Teaching English As A Second Language Experience Teaching Students From Diverse Backgrounds And Abilities Having Teaching Experiences Using International Curriculum Materials Such As Igcse Gac Is Preferred Knowledge The Candidate Should Have A Competent Capability And Understanding Of English Language And Literature For Speaking Listening Reading And Writing As Well As Analysis Of Literature Works Must Have A Strong Understanding Of English Language Arts Including Grammar Vocabulary Speech Presentation Public Speaking Journals Academic Reports And Research As Well As English Learning Skills Tools And Devices Skills Excellent Communication And Interpersonal Skills Are Essential Must Be Able To Create Engaging Lessons Manage Classroom Behavior Effectively Effective Teaching Learning Process Methods And Assess Student Progress Proficiency In Technology Including The Use Of Educational Software Multimedia Tools And Online Learning Platforms Is Highly Desirable Classroom Management The Candidate Should Have The Ability To Manage A Classroom Of High School Students Effectively Maintaining Discipline And Ensuring An Environment Conducive To Learning Personal Qualities A Passion For Education A Positive Attitude A Willingness To Learn And Grow And A Commitment To Student Success Are Essential Professionalism The Candidate Should Have A Professional Demeanor With The Ability To Maintain Good Work Ethics Work Collaboratively With Colleagues Actively Participate In Professional Development Opportunities And Adhere To The School S Vision Mission And Values If You Meet The Above Qualifications And Are Passionate About The Prospect Of Teaching Upper Level English We Encourage You To Apply For This Position Send Your Cv And Credentials To Us Thank You

Job Summary As A Maintenance Operator At Our Ice Cream Factory You Will Play A Crucial Role In Ensuring The Smooth Operation Of Our Production Machinery And Facilities Your Primary Responsibility Will Be To Conduct Regular Maintenance Checks Diagnose And Repair Mechanical Issues And Perform Preventive Maintenance Tasks To Minimize Downtime Additionally You Will Collaborate With Other Team Members To Optimize Production Efficiency And Uphold Safety Standards Responsibilities Perform Routine Maintenance Tasks On Production Machinery Including But Not Limited To Freezers Mixers Fillers And Packaging Equipment Conduct Inspections To Identify Any Mechanical Or Electrical Issues And Troubleshoot Problems Efficiently Repair Or Replace Defective Parts Components Or Systems As Needed To Restore Equipment Functionality Execute Preventive Maintenance Procedures According To Established Schedules To Prevent Equipment Breakdowns And Ensure Reliability Maintain Accurate Records Of Maintenance Activities Including Work Performed Parts Used And Equipment Condition Collaborate With Production Supervisors And Operators To Prioritize Maintenance Tasks And Minimize Disruptions To Production Schedules Adhere To Safety Protocols And Regulations At All Times To Create A Secure Working Environment For Yourself And Your Colleagues Assist In The Installation Of New Equipment And Machinery Ensuring Proper Setup And Integration With Existing Systems Participate In Training Programs To Stay Updated On New Technologies Equipment Upgrades And Maintenance Techniques Support Continuous Improvement Initiatives By Suggesting Efficiency Enhancements Cost Saving Measures And Process Optimizations Qualifications High School Diploma Or Equivalent Technical Certification Or Vocational Training In Maintenance Or A Related Field Preferred Proven Experience As A Maintenance Technician Or Operator In A Manufacturing Or Food Processing Environment Preferably In The Dairy Or Frozen Food Industry Strong Mechanical Aptitude And Troubleshooting Skills With The Ability To Diagnose And Repair Electrical Hydraulic And Pneumatic Systems Familiarity With Maintenance Tools Equipment And Techniques Including Hand Tools Power Tools And Precision Instruments Familiar With Plc Siemens Abbfamiliar With Trouble Shooting Pumpknowledge Of Safety Protocols And Regulations Related To Machinery Operation And Maintenance Excellent Communication And Teamwork Abilities With The Capacity To Collaborate Effectively With Colleagues Across Departments Flexibility To Work In Shifts And Respond To Emergency Maintenance Situations Outside Of Regular Hours Attention To Detail And A Commitment To Quality Craftsmanship In Performing Maintenance Tasks Physical Stamina And Dexterity To Work In A Fast Paced Production Environment And Lift Heavy Equipment Or Parts As Needed Problem Solving Mindset And A Proactive Approach To Identifying And Resolving Maintenance Issues Available Work Shift Placement In Giic Deltamas Cikarang

Job Title: regulatory officer dan penanggung jawab teknis pjt alat kesehatan

Job Description: Nusa Asia Medika Lokasi Green Lake City Tangerang Membuka Lowongan Untuk Regulatory Officer Dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis Pjt Medical Device Alat Kesehatan Deskripsi Pekerjaan Regulatory Officer Dan Penanggung Jawab Teknis Pjt Menjadi Penanggung Jawab Teknis Pjt Perusahaan Yang Bergerak Dalam Bidang Alat Kesehatan Mengikuti Perkembangan Terbaru Dari Rangkaian Produk Perusahaan Mendukung Pengajuan Pendaftaran Izin Distribusi Alat Kesehatan Idak Izin Edar Alat Kesehatan Luar Negeri Sertifikasi Dan Lisensi Cdakb Lisensi Tkdn Dan Perpanjangan Dengan Tenggat Waktu Yang Ketat Untuk Memastikan Sertifikat Produk Sesuai Dengan Kode Ruang Lingkup Produk Aplikasi E Report Untuk Alkes Dan Distribusi Alkes Oleh Produsen Atau Distributor Alkes Secara Proaktif Melacak Semua Registrasi Menyimpan Catatan Registrasi Dan Mulai Aktivitas Pembaruan Yang Tepat Untuk Memastikan Bahwa Registrasi Saat Ini Tidak Kadaluarsa Dan Membahayakan Penjualan Di Indonesia Mengikuti Perkembangan Peraturan Alat Kesehatan Dan Memberikan Panduan Kepada Tim Pengembangan Produk Terkait Data Dan Informasi Yang Diperlukan Untuk Mempersiapkan Pendaftaran Tersebut Mendukung Inspeksi Regulasi Oleh Badan Regulator Badan Yang Diberitahukan Setempat Jika Diperlukan Berkoordinasi Dengan Principals Untuk Menginformasikan Kepada Pihak Berwenang Di Indonesia Mengenai Perubahan Pada Produk Yang Didaftarkan Melaksanakan Tugas Tugas Regulasi Kualitas Lainnya Yang Didelegasikan Oleh Manajer Atau Manajemen Pt Nusa Asia Medika Apabila Seluruh Kegiatan Yang Berhubungan Dengan Regulatory Telah Terselesaikan Dengan Baik Memberikan Dukungan Untuk Aktifitas Penjualan Dan Atau Pemasaran Perusahaan Termasuk Di Dalamnya Adalah Untuk Membuat Standard Operating Procedure Sop Perusahaan Memberikan Pelatihan Training Kepada Seluruh Karyawan Perusahaan Atas Sop Ini Dan Memastikan Bahwa Sop Berjalan Dengan Baik Persyaratan Memiliki Pengalaman Kerja Minimal Tahun Di Bidang Regulatory Affairs Untuk Produk Alat Kesehatanmemiliki Setidaknya Gelar Sarjana Farmasi Dari Universitas Yang Terakreditasimemiliki Kemampuan Komunikasi Lisan Dan Tulisan Yang Sangat Baik Dengan Kemampuan Bahasa Inggris Yang Baikkemampuan Untuk Bekerja Secara Mandiri Dengan Pengawasan Minimal Mengatur Memprioritaskan Dan Mengelola Beberapa Proyek Secara Efektifsikap Positif Perhatian Yang Kuat Terhadap Detail Dan Kemampuan Untuk Memecahkan Masalah Secara Mandiripemahaman Yang Komprehensif Tentang Kegiatan Regulasi Dan Bagaimana Dampaknya Terhdap Produk Dan Atau Proses Lainnya Pengetahuan Tentang Sistem Manajemen Mutu Kompilasi File Teknis Dan Persyaratan Peraturan Perangkat Medis Indonesia

Atasan Di Departemennya Level Minimum Supervisor Memiliki Kemampuan Bahasa Inggris Pasif Memiliki Jiwa Kepemimpinan Jujur Dan Integritas Yang Tinggimemiliki Kemampuan Komunikasi Yang Baik Dan Lancarmampu Bekerja Secara Individu Dan Tim Dengan Baikcekatan Inovatif Dan Terampil Perihal Pengembangan Produksi Yang Diperlukankemampuan Mengambil Keputusan Yang Cepat Dan Tepat Terutama Perihal Penyelesaian Masalah Yang Terjadi Selama Proses Produksi Di Dalam Perusahaanmemiliki Wawasan Yang Luas Tentang Proses Pengolahan Pabrik Keselamatan Kerja Tanggung Jawab Membantu Manajer Pabrik Untuk Mencapai Target Produksi Sesuai Standar Kualitas Berkoordinasi Dengan Kepala Departemen Dan Melakukan Pengawasan Pada Proses Produksi Secara Keseluruhan Mengawasi Pemeliharaan Peralatan Dan Infrastruktur Di Dalam Pabrik Untuk Meminimalkan Waktu Henti Dan Meningkatkan Kehandalan Operasional Memantau Dan Menegakkan Prosedur Keselamatan Untuk Memastikan Lingkungan Kerja Yang Aman Bagi Semua Karyawan Dan Mematuhi Persyaratan Regulasi Menganalisis Data Produksi Dan Mengidentifikasi Area Yang Perlu Ditingkatkan Untuk Meningkatkan Produktivitas Dan Mengurangi Biaya Memberikan Bimbingan Proses Dan Menyelesaikan Masalah Operasional Tetap Terkini Dengan Tren Industri Kemajuan Teknologi Dan Praktik Terbaik Untuk Menerapkan Solusi Inovatif Dan Meningkatkan Operasional Pabrik Menyiapkan Laporan Dan Presentasi Untuk Manajemen Senior Menyoroti Indikator Kinerja Staff Tantangan Produksi Dan Solusi Yang Diusulkan Bertindak Sebagai Perantara Antara Manajemen Dan Staff Pabrik Sebagai Job Description: Pt Srihapan Mega Persada Adalah Perusahaan Pma Yang Bergerak Dibidang Property Sebagai Pengembang Kami Memiliki Proyek Di Jakarta Palu Kendari Dan Yogya Dengan Fokus Pengembangan Saat Ini Di Palu Sulawesi Tengah Yang Merupakan Kawasan Seluas Ha Memandang Ke Teluk Palu Dengan Nama Kawasan Palu City Square Pcs Kami Membuka Lowongan Untuk Branch Manager Bm Di Pcs Yang Merupakan Kawasan Terpadu Sejak Dengan Pembangunan Ruko Sebanyak Unit Dan Telah Ditempati Bisnis Keuangan Dengan Percencanaan Pembangunan Berikutnya Ditahun Ini Dalam Bentuk Proyek Perumahan Kami Membutuhkan Karyawan Yang Mempunyai Motivasi Tinggi Dan Open Minded Untuk Bekerjasama Dengan Manajement Srihapan Mengawal Pembangunan Perumahan Disana Menjadi Perumahan Yang Berkualitas Bermanfaat Bagi Masyarakat Lokal Dan Menjadi Ikon Di Kota Palu Position Branch Manager Bm Kota Palu Sulawesi Tengahresponsibilities Menangani Seluruh Operasional Kantor Cabang Dengan Memberikan Suasana Kerja Yang Positif Terhadap Semua Bagian Operasional Seperti Teknisi Engineering Kebersihan Housekeeping Keamanan Security Dan Parkir Sesuai Sop Menyusun Strategy Untuk Mengembangkan Marketing Sales Dikawasan Pcs Mempelajari Permintaan Demand Dan Penawaran Supply Untuk Penjualan Proyek Mengawasi Dan Mengevaluasi Pencapaian Target Penjualan Versus Budget Bertanggung Jawab Terhadap Credit Collection Di Kantor Cabang Palu Membuat Rencana Sumber Daya Manusia Sdm Dan Membantu Pelatihan Terhadap Karyawan Marketing Dan Melakukan Evaluasi Kinerja Menjaga Mempertahankan Relasi Bisnis Dengan Pembeli Penyewa Dan Membantumenyelesaikan Berbagai Masalah Yang Berkaitan Dengan Proyek Di Pcs Memastikan Terlaksananya Hubungan Baik Dengan Instansi Pemerintah Setempat Memonitor Pekerjaan Proses Pembangunan Di Lapangan Berjalan Sesuai Dengan Target Danmelaporkan Ke Menegement Pusat Menjaga Transparansi Terhadap Laporan Proyek Keuangan Dan Operasional Dengan Menjunjungtinggi Integritas Dan Melapor Kepada Manajement Secara Berkala Requirements Usia Maksimal Tahun Minimal Sarjana S Semua Jurusan Dengan Ipk Min Pengalaman Tahun Minimal Di Perusahaan Properti Pengembang Developer Memiliki Pengetahuan Tentang Teknik Pembangunan Menjadi Nilai Plus Keterampilan Negosiasi Dan Analitis Yang Kuat Energi Motivasi Dan Dedikasi Yang Tinggi Kepemimpinan Yang Kuat Dalam Mengelola Banyak Tim Siap Di Tempatkan Di Luar Kota

Availability Of Products And Creditscredit Services Credit As A Service To Farmers Input Retailers And Crop Collectors For Buying Inputs And Paying Farmers In Timeadvisory Platform To Educate Farmers On Best Practices For Growing Their Crops Based On Weather Conditions And Information Like Location Seed Type Sowing Date Etc Jiva Is Focused On Smallholder Farmers As We Believe They Are Key To The Future Of Agriculture Humanity The Planet However They Face Significant Challenges Million Smallholder Farmers Globally Support Over Billion People Within Their Families Yet They Comprise The Majority Of The World S Poorest Peoplesmallholder Farmers Produce Of The World S Food Yet They Comprise The World S Most Undernourished Hungry Populationthey Are The Most Vulnerable To Climate Change Which Threatens Up To Of Crop Yields Since Starting Operations In Q Jiva Has Worked With Over K Smallholder Farmers In Indonesia To Procure Over Mt Of Corn We Are Looking To Exponentially Grow Our Input Ecommerce Business To Over Usd Mn Business In The Next Years About Olam Olam International Is A Leading Food And Agri Business Supplying Food Ingredients Feed And Fiber To Over Customers Worldwide Our Food Systems Olam Aims To Address The Many Challenges Involved In Meeting The Needs Of A Growing Global Population While Achieving A Positive Impact On Farming Communities Our Planet And All Our Exceptional Fulfillment Executive Who Is Passionate About Our Mission To Lead The Fulfillment Of The Agri Inputs E Commerce Business Of Jiva Indonesia The Role Will Be Based Out Of East Java Reporting Directly To The National Fulfillment Manager The Venture Is Backed By Olam International Which Has An Unparalleled Presence In Rural Communities And Relationships With Millions Of Smallholder Farmers It Is Uniquely Positioned To Drive Profit With Purpose Disrupting The Agriculture Industry And Generating Outsized Financial Returns While Creating A Real Impact For Some Of The World S Poorest Farmers And Their Families And The Planet By Promoting Sustainable Farming Practices What Jiva Offers Shape An Entire Fulfillment Line Of Startup And Product In Its Early Stage Of Growthmake A Real Restaurant Accountant At Mama Pizza You Will Oversee All Aspects Of Our Financial Operations And Ensure The Accuracy And Integrity Of Our Financial Reporting You Will Be Responsible For Managing The Day To Day Accounting Functions Including Accounts Payable Accounts Receivable Payroll And General Ledger Ensuring Compliance With All Accounting Standards Tax Regulations And Internal Controls Preparing Monthly Financial Statements Including Profit And Loss Statements Balance Sheets And Cash Flow Statements Analyzing Financial Data And Providing Insights To Support Strategic Decision Making And Operational Improvements Developing And Implementing Accounting Policies Procedures And Controls To Streamline Processes And Enhance Efficiency Leading The Annual Budgeting Process And Providing Ongoing Variance Analysis And Financial Performance Reporting Collaborating With External Auditors And Tax Advisors To Facilitate Audits And Tax Filings Mentoring And Supervising Junior Accounting Staff Providing Guidance And Support As Needed Qualifications Bachelor S Degree In Accounting Finance Or Related Field Cpa Certified Public Accountant Certification Preferred Years Of Progressive Experience In Accounting Roles Preferably In The Restaurant Or Hospitality Industry Proficiency In Accounting Software E G Quickbooks Sap Oracle And Microsoft Excel Strong Understanding Of Gaap Generally Accepted Accounting Principles And Financial Reporting Standards Excellent Analytical Skills With A Proven Ability To Interpret Financial Data And Provide Strategic Insights Exceptional Organizational And Time Management Skills With The Ability To Prioritize And Multitask Effectively Strong Leadership And Communication Skills With A Collaborative And Team Oriented Approach Knowledge Of Restaurant Specific Accounting Practices And Software E G Aloha Micros Is A Plus Benefits Competitive Salary Package Commensurate With Experience Comprehensive Benefits Package Including Health Insurance Retirement Plans And Paid Time Off Opportunities For Professional Development And Career Advancement Within A Dynamic And Growing Company A Supportive And Inclusive Work Environment With A Focus On Employee Well Being And Work Life Balance Discounts On Dining And Other Perks For Employees
